subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: At the Travelers Championship in Cromwell, Conn., the course can be tricky, but it is not nearly as treacherous as Merion Golf Club, the site of last week’s United States Open.
snippet: At the Travelers Championship in Cromwell, Conn., the course can be tricky, but it is not nearly as treacherous as Merion Golf Club, the site of last week’s United States Open.
